name: unregistry
description: Unregistry is a self-hosted Docker registry browser that presents images, tags, and metadata from container registries in a user-friendly web interface.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Browse Docker registry contents through a user-friendly web interface

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: View all images stored in your Docker registry with metadata and details

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: See all tags for each image with creation dates and sizes

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search for images and tags across your registry quickly

features.title: Tag Deletion
features.description: Delete unused tags to reclaim storage space in your registry
